original:
The extensive duration and influence of ancient civilizations have resulted in the preservation of numerous artworks and the transmission of their artistic practices to subsequent cultures. Notably, these civilizations have provided some of the earliest records detailing the methods employed by artists.

During the period of Greek art, there was a profound appreciation for the human form, characterized by the development of techniques t
